thread.title: Cindrella's waltz in America
thread.title_full: Cindrella's waltz in America - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Cindrella's waltz in America
text:
Having already created quite a buzz, director Kiran Nakti's forthcoming Marathi film 'Cindrella', has now been selected for screening at the South Carolina Underground Film Festival ( SCUFF), which begins on November 14, 2015 at Charleston, South Carolina, before its official release, according to a website.
"The film presents an interesting tale of a distinctive relationship of a brother and sister. So, it will be curious to know, how the story of this film relates to the famous fairy tale. There is already talk about the performances debutant child artistes Rupesh Bane & Yashasvi Vengurlekar in this film. But, Mangesh Desai is also playing an important role in this film, along with veteran artistes Yakub Saeed and Janardan Parab," said marathimovieworld.com.
READ: Vidya Balan with mangesh Desai
Well-known cinematographer Raja Phadtare has handled the camera work of this film, which will be released on December 4, across Maharashtra.
WATCH: Song from the movie
